Sun, 02 Mar 2025 16:00:00 +0000 The latest wastewater testing figures show meth is still the drug of choice for the nation’s drug users and dominates wastewater samples from all the country’s 11 policing districts. Cocaine use, albeit scant by comparison, is on the rise.
